card.description: Data collected from 'African Safari Tours', a company that offers tours of the Serengeti plains in Africa.

context.potentialUses: Can be used to determine the best times to visit the safari to make sure you see the most amount of wildlife.
context.potentialMisuses: Only certain types of animals are tracked, so avoid jumping to conclusions on animals that are not a part of this set (like zebras or hippopotamus).

fields.description: Number of lions seen during a visit.
Amount of total people on safari during a visit.
The day of the month (1-31) of a visit.
The profit of the safari company on the day of a visit.
Number of antelope seen during a visit.
Number of rhinos seen during a visit.
Number of elephants seen during a visit.
Number of alligators seen during a visit.
Number of overgrowth and trees providing shade seen during the visit.
Number of mosquitos seen during the visit.
Percent of the land that has grass and bushes and shrubbery during a visit.
